content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
add a form for submitting info about your cat. be very detailed
Noted, we will create a comprehensive cat submission form.

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "Should the form include a photo upload option for the cat?", "option1": "Yes, include a photo upload option.", "option2": "No, photos are not necessary."}, {"question 2": "Do you want the form to have customizable fields so the owner can add specific details about their cat not covered by the standard questions?", "option1": "Yes, include customizable fields for additional information.", "option2": "No, stick to the predefined set of questions."}], "input_token_count": 261, "output_token_count": 112, "time_taken": "0:00:03.604967"}

{"status": "success", "ui_elements_checklist": [{"feature": "Customizable cat profile creation form including fields for name, age, breed, and photo upload.", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Health tracker section for logging vaccinations, vet visits, and medical history.", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Behavior and preferences section for logging favorite toys, foods, and activities.", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Social features for sharing cat profiles with other users.", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Appointment scheduling system for walking and other services.", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Lost and found feature with GPS tracking for the safety of the cat.", "checked": false}], "input_token_count": 215, "output_token_count": 135, "time_taken": "0:00:10.900586"}
Alright, I'll make it pink as requested.

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "Do you prefer a specific shade of pink for the form, or should we choose a default gentle shade?", "option1": "Choose a specific shade (please specify)", "option2": "Use a default gentle shade of pink"}, {"question 2": "Should the pink color theme be applied to the entire form area or specific elements only (e.g., form background, input fields, submit button)?", "option1": "Apply to the entire form area", "option2": "Apply to specific elements only (please specify)"}], "input_token_count": 306, "output_token_count": 124, "time_taken": "0:00:04.697948"}

{"status": "success", "ui_elements_checklist": [{"feature": "Option to customize the form background color", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Add a color picker for users to choose any color scheme they prefer, including shades of pink", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Include a preview button to see form changes in real-time before submission", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Implement a 'save your progress' feature for form completion in multiple sessions", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Add an accessibility option for colorblind users, ensuring the form is usable by everyone", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Provide themes for the form, including a default pink theme as requested", "checked": true}], "input_token_count": 260, "output_token_count": 154, "time_taken": "0:00:05.507693"}
